title: Most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The maximum Share in total export 21.8 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Share in total export is 4.3.
There is a difference of 17.5 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Netherlands.
